alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Crockett; Gibson; Haywood; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 1:19PM CST until December 09 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Crockett County in west Tennessee... Southern Gibson County in west Tennessee... Southwestern Carroll County in west Tennessee... Central Haywood County in west Tennessee... Northwestern Madison County in west Tennessee... * Until 200 PM CST. * At 119 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Nutbush, or near Brownsville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jackson, Brownsville, Humboldt, Milan, Trenton, Fairview, Alamo, Bells, Three Way, Nutbush, Belle Eagle, Holly Grove, Adair, Medina, Maury City, Gadsden, Gibson, Quincy, Gibson Wells, and Allens. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for west Tennessee.
